Welcome in, Dcoburn. Here's some info on the Alliance:

The Alliance is a fairly elite group, mostly consisting of killers and 
psychos. It was founded by Zardus, under Vok influence, along with Wolfang, 
Ominous Prime, Reptilica, and Bloodystrike. The Vok influence ordered Zardus 
to get the group together to destroy the other bots on the planet.

Now however, the Alliance does what it feels is best for it, including saving 
and destroying factions, and everything like that. In short, they try to keep 
the war going between the Maximals and Predacons, so that both factions will 
be too busy with each other to bother the Alliance.

The Alliance was originally collectively ruled by all five of the first 
members, but soon Ominous Prime betrayed, Wolfang tried to take over and 
failed (resulting in him being put in a torture chamber), and Reptilica and 
Bloodystrike were not smart or competent enough to share the rule, so Zardus 
took full command. Since then, the Alliance has killed, tortured, sometimes 
defended, and has grown into possibly the strongest faction (or maybe second 
strongest) of the Neo Beast Wars.

That's about it for the Alliance. Your post wasn't long at all, in fact it 
was shorter than alot of the posts the others write. Long posts arn't bad 
RPGing, doing alot of things in one post is (there is a difference). Some 
people like to pump their posts full of their character's thoughts and 
feelings, making them almost novel-size.
